text: Carie Brand Graves (June 17, 1953 â€“ December 19, 2021) was an American rower. She won a gold medal at the 1984 Summer Olympics and a bronze in 1976. Graves died on December 19, 2021 at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the United States Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:American rowers Category:Sportspeople from Madison, Wisconsin
